hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/sh -x mkdir -p `pwd`/logs
PACKAGE1=firefox-latest-nightly.en-US.win64.zip BUILD_FILE1=firefox-latest-nightly.en-US.win64.txt MACHINE1=$WIN64_1 ARCH1=x86_64 OS1='win8-64'
PACKAGE2=firefox-latest-aurora.en-US.linux-x86_64.tar.bz2 BUILD_FILE2=firefox-latest-aurora.en-US.linux-x86_64.txt MACHINE2=$LINUX64_1 ARCH2=x86_64 OS2='linux-64'
curl http://pf-jenkins.qa.mtv2.mozilla.com:8080/job/firefox-nightly-win64/ws/releases/$PACKAGE1 > $PACKAGE1 curl http://pf-jenkins.qa.mtv2.mozilla.com:8080/job/firefox-nightly-win64/ws/releases/$BUILD_FILE1 > $BUILD_FILE1
if [ "$PACKAGE1" != "$PACKAGE2" ] ; then curl http://pf-jenkins.qa.mtv2.mozilla.com:8080/job/firefox-aurora-linux64/ws/releases/$PACKAGE2 > $PACKAGE2 curl http://pf-jenkins.qa.mtv2.mozilla.com:8080/job/firefox-aurora-linux64/ws/releases/$BUILD_FILE2 > $BUILD_FILE2 fi
python `pwd`/mozplatformqa-jenkins/jenkinsherder.py --os1 $OS1 --os2 $OS2 --no-treeherding --steeplechase `pwd`/steeplechase/steeplechase/runsteeplechase.py --package $PACKAGE1 --package2 $PACKAGE2 --save-logs-to `pwd`/logs --specialpowers-path /home/mozilla/firefoxes/aurora/linux64/tests/steeplechase/specialpowers --prefs-file /home/mozilla/firefoxes/aurora/linux64/tests/steeplechase/prefs_general.js --signalling-server $SIGNALLING_SERVER --html-manifest /home/mozilla/firefoxes/aurora/linux64/tests/steeplechase/tests/steeplechase.ini --host1 $MACHINE1:20701 --arch1 $ARCH1 --host2 $MACHINE2:20701 --arch2 $ARCH2
